name: Car Race: A Shooting car racing
name_original: Car Race: A Shooting car racing
description:
Car Race : The Shooting car racing
This is the car race game where you have to shoot your opponents while racing at high speeds.
Your super car powered with a missile launcher. Boom..!
just shoot the opponents coming in your way to win.
sounds like an action movie, isn't it?
yes it is fantastic game, just download and feel the arcade and shooting arena while racing with your super car
